data.comment: Today's referee, Joseph Dickerson, has blown to start the match.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Joseph Dickerson awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
Free kick Vancouver.
In the minute 4, Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
Vancouver's Lucas Cavallini gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
In the minute 8, Throw-in LA Galaxy.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 11, In Vancouver LA Galaxy drive forward through Yony Gonzalez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for Vancouver in the half of LA Galaxy.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lucas Cavallini (Vancouver) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for LA Galaxy at BC Place.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of Vancouver.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 19, LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
Efrain Alvarez (LA Galaxy) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 21, LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Cristian Dajome for Vancouver gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vancouver.
In the minute 23, LA Galaxy's Joe Corona gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Vancouver defender.
Goal! Lucas Cavallini heads Vancouver into a 1-0 lead.
Cristian Gutierrez instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 26, LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 27, Vancouver have a goal kick.
Vancouver's Lucas Cavallini attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Joseph Dickerson awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Joseph Dickerson signals a Vancouver throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy close to the penalty box.
In the minute 31, Cristian Pavon for LA Galaxy drives towards goal at BC Place. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the home team.
LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in high up the field for LA Galaxy in Vancouver.
Can Vancouver capitalize from this throw-in deep inside LA Galaxy's half?
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Vancouver just outside LA Galaxy's area.
In the minute 36, Cristian Dajome gets his shot on target but fails to score for Vancouver.
Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
At BC Place, LA Galaxy are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 37, Vancouver have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in the half of Vancouver.
In the minute 38, LA Galaxy push upfield but Joseph Dickerson quickly pulls them for offside.
LA Galaxy will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Vancouver.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Cristian Gutierrez for Vancouver who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Cristian Gutierrez has recovered and rejoins the match in Vancouver.
In the minute 41, Julian Araujo LA Galaxy.
Vancouver push forward at BC Place and Fredy Montero gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined LA Galaxy defence.
In the minute 43, Great finish from Fredy Montero to give Vancouver a 2-0 lead.
Great play from Ali Adnan to set up the goal.
The away team replace Yony Gonzalez with Rolf Feltscher.
In the minute 45, LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Vancouver are pushing forward but Fredy Montero's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for LA Galaxy at BC Place.
The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway in Vancouver.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Vancouver close to the penalty box.
In the minute 46, Chicharito is replacing Ethan Zubak for the away team.
Lucas Cavallini (Vancouver) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 47, Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
Joseph Dickerson signals a throw-in for Vancouver, close to LA Galaxy's area.
Vancouver's Russell Teibert gets in a shot on goal at BC Place. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Vancouver.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 52, Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
LA Galaxy's Perry Kitchen has been booked in Vancouver.
LA Galaxy advance rapidly upfield but Joseph Dickerson blows for offside.
In the minute 54, LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Vancouver at BC Place.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
LA Galaxy make their third substitution with Sacha Kljestan replacing Joe Corona.
Efrain Alvarez of LA Galaxy gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vancouver.
In the minute 57, Vancouver's Lucas Cavallini misses with an attempt on goal.
Joseph Dickerson awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 59, Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Throw-in LA Galaxy.
LA Galaxy needs to be cautious. Vancouver have an attacking throw-in.
Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
In the minute 65, LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at BC Place.
In Vancouver Vancouver drive forward through Cristian Dajome. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Vancouver.
LA Galaxy to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Free kick in a good position for LA Galaxy!
Chicharito of LA Galaxy smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Important block from the Vancouver defence as Sacha Kljestan fires in a strike for LA Galaxy.
In the minute 78, LA Galaxy drives forward and Chicharito gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sacha Kljestan for LA Galaxy drives towards goal at BC Place. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for LA Galaxy at BC Place.
Tosaint Ricketts is on a sub for Ali Adnan for Vancouver.
The home team replace Lucas Cavallini with Theo Bair.
In the minute 87, Emil Cuello is replacing Emiliano Insua for the away team.
Guillermo Schelotto is making the team's fifth substitution at BC Place with Kai Koreniuk replacing Efrain Alvarez.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 88, In Vancouver Vancouver attack through Theo Bair. The finish is off target, however.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
LA Galaxy's Chicharito is on target but unsuccessful.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Vancouver.
The match has come to a close in Vancouver. The final score is 3-0.
Vancouver take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Fredy Montero.
Cristian Dajome with an assist there.
The home team have replaced Fredy Montero with Damiano Pecile. This is the third substitution made today by Marc Dos Santos.
